name: KIDMED_SC_UC
description: This table holds claim information from KIDMED GENERAL INFORMATION multiple response columns.

columns.name: CLAIM_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the claim information record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: KIDMED_SC_UC_C_NAME
columns.description: This item stores whether there are suspected conditions for the visit that are under care.
